alert.note: Alert for Kent; Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 1:23PM EST until December 30 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton MA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Massachusetts...Rhode Island... Sudbury River At Saxonville affecting Middlesex County. Pawtuxet River At Cranston affecting Providence and Kent Counties. For the Sudbury River...including Saxonville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pawtuxet River...including Scituate Reservoir, Cranston... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pawtuxet River at Cranston. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur along the river as it flows through Warwick and Cranston. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 9.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM EST.
